title: Best of The Herd: 11/20/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 11/20/2018
description:
Colin reacts to an all-time great game between the Rams and Chiefs and despite losing still thinks the Chiefs are the better team. He says the Aaron Rodgers/Mike McCarthy relationship has run its course in Green Bay. Plus, Greg Cosell of NFL Films talks about Drew Brees having possibly his best season and how the Cowboys need everything to go right for Dak Prescott to succeed. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
